title: Help me!
content:

A proud member of the beta testing society
"I help entertain!" -Harvey
"I always try to consume interesting animals."-LevelLord

title: Re: Help me!
content:
Officially released source codes to older games?
Give them to a good programmer and ask him to compile after adding neat features like multiplayer, modern video card support, &c., &c..Retodon8
You live, you die, you are remembered, you are forgotten. [url=http://keen.retodon8.net/][img]http://retodon8.net/Graphics/Keen_Yorp.gif[/img][/url]

title: Re: Help me!
content:

title: Re: Help me!
content:
You run them through a compiler to get a program you can run. The exact way to do this depends on the compiler you have, what language the program is in, and how it's meant to be compiled.________________
[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v462/lemur821/YorpEye.png[/img]
